history.proof: intros l1 l2 H. unfold same_sum_leaves in H. destruct H as [l3 [l4 [Hperm [Hperm' Heq]]]]. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: pose proof (permutation_length A (sum_leaves f) l3 l4) as Hlength.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type f : A -> nat l1, l2, l3, l4 : list (btree A) Hperm : permutation l1 l3 Hperm' : permutation l2 l4 Heq : map (sum_leaves f) l3 = map (sum_leaves f) l4 The term "sum_leaves f" has type "btree A -> nat" while it is expected to have type "list A".

In environment A : Type f : A -> nat l1, l2, l3, l4 : list (btree A) Hperm : permutation l1 l3 Hperm' : permutation l2 l4 Heq : map (sum_leaves f) l3 = map (sum_leaves f) l4 Unable to unify "permutation l1 l3" with "length l1 = length l2".

chat.content:
A: Type
f: A -> nat
============================
forall l1 l2 : list (btree A), same_sum_leaves l1 l2 -> length l1 = length l2

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
same_sum_leaves = fun l1 l2 : list (btree A) => exists l3 l4 : list (btree A), permutation l1 l3 /\ permutation l2 l4 /\ map (sum_leaves f) l3 = map (sum_leaves f) l4 : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> Prop Arguments same_sum_leaves (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2
list_length_induction : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type), (forall l1 : list A, (forall l2 : list A, length l2 < length l1 -> P l2) -> P l1) -> forall l : list A, P l
weight_tree_list_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2
ordered_sum_leaves_eq : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> ordered (sum_order f) l1 -> ordered (sum_order f) l2 -> map (sum_leaves f) l1 = map (sum_leaves f) l2
cover_permutation : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
first_n_app1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), length l1 <= n -> first_n (l1 ++ l2) n = l1 ++ first_n l2 (n - length l1)
nth_split : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ nth n l d :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
permutation_trans : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3
length_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), length (l1 ++ l2) = length l1 + length l2
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
all_permutations_permutation : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), In l1 (all_permutations l2) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_all_permutations : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations l2)
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
skip_n_app1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), length l1 <= n -> skip_n (l1 ++ l2) n = skip_n l2 (n - length l1)
ordered_perm_antisym_eq : forall (A : Type) (order : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c) -> (forall a b : A, order a b -> order b a -> a = b) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> ordered order l1 -> ordered order l2 -> l1 = l2
first_n_length : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 : list A), n <= length l1 -> length (first_n l1 n) = n
in_ex_app : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2
same_length_ex : forall (A B : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A) (l3 : list B), length (l1 ++ a :: l2) = length l3 -> exists (l4 l5 : list B) (b : B), length l1 = length l4 /\ length l2 = length l5 /\ l3 = l4 ++ b :: l5
cover_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover l2 t2 -> cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
cover_node : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3
permutation_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
fold_left_permutation : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A), (forall (a : A) (b1 b2 : B), f (f a b1) b2 = f (f a b2) b1) -> forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), permutation l1 l2 -> fold_left f l1 a = fold_left f l2 a
cover_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (node t1 t2) -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
Inductive permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := permutation_nil : permutation nil nil | permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) | permutation_swap : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l) | permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3 Arguments permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_nil _%type_scope Arguments permutation_skip _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_swap _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments permutation_trans _%type_scope (_ _ _)%list_scope
skip_n_length : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 : list A), length (skip_n l1 n) = length l1 - n
permutation_app_comp : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l3 l4 -> permutation (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4)
permutation_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) (a :: l2) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_skip : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1)

```
intros l1 l2 H. unfold same_sum_leaves in H. destruct H as [l3 [l4 [Hperm [Hperm' Heq]]]].
pose proof (permutation_length A (sum_leaves f) l3 l4) as Hlength.
rewrite <- Heq in Hlength. apply Hlength in Hperm. apply Hperm.
```

original: intros l1 l2 H. unfold same_sum_leaves in H. destruct H as [l3 [l4 [Hperm [Hperm' Heq]]]]. pose proof (permutation_length A (sum_leaves f) l3 l4) as Hlength. rewrite <- Heq in Hlength. apply Hlength in Hperm. apply Hperm.
